asioOut.InitRecordAndPlayback(null, 1, 44100);

{
e.GetAsInterleavedSamples();

}

i need float[] (e) to byte[] (PCM16BIT)...

please help me...
hi, have a read of my article on how to convert between various audio formats. It should point you in the right direction
